products.name: iPhone 12

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S21
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 features a brilliant Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and a versatile camera system.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Headphones

products.name: DJI Mavic Air 2
products.description: The DJI Mavic Air 2 is a compact and powerful drone with a 48MP camera and 4K video capability.

products.name: Fitbit Versa 3
products.description: The Fitbit Versa 3 is a feature-packed smartwatch that tracks your workouts, sleep, and heart rate.

products.name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II Wireless Headphones
products.description: The Bose QuietComfort 35 II headphones offer world-class noise cancellation and balanced audio performance.

products.name: Google Pixel 6
products.description: The Google Pixel 6 features a powerful camera system and the latest Android operating system.

products.name: Apple Watch Series 7
products.description: The Apple Watch Series 7 is a premium smartwatch with advanced health and fitness features.

products.name: Amazon Echo (4th Gen)
products.description: The Amazon Echo (4th Gen) is a smart speaker with improved sound quality and built-in Alexa voice assistant.
